description: FTX is an online digital exchange for cryptocurrency and crypto derivatives. It is designed to support the trading of BTC options and other popular crypto derivatives. FTX helps gain access to the best spot trading practices and enables fund transfers via fiat and stable cryptocurrencies, such as Ethereum, Bitcoin, and Litecoin. It supports a selected range of stablecoins and altcoins.
name: FTX
